name: Tappan St.
tag_list: change-in-society, crowdsourcing, character, creating-change, social-networking, networks, networking
overview: Catchabody™ is an evolution of social networking that gives you the opportunity to create positive change in society. Simply, it is social networking with a purpose. That purpose is one of prevention. Existing social networks like Facebook® and LinkedIn® show only what that person wants you to see. They are a form of self-flattery. Catchabody is here to stop the proliferation of all questionable behaviors; the unethical, the fraudulent, the illegal and the generally bad.
